Text.Page: Naga agitation has resulted in animals running rampant across the Boan Strand. Sadly, we must treat the symptoms as well as the cause. Go thin out the rampaging herds of {@LinkCreature:10#20#frillfang sabertooths}, {@LinkCreature:10#4#lumbering kamaras}, {@LinkCreature:10#7#vicious mycanars}, and {@LinkCreature:10#9#longtusk slashers}. And, as we don't want to waste an opportunity, collect their hearts for Briale.
Thanks to you, Castanica is safeâ€”and open for business!
I know you have a lot on your plate, but we know you're up to it, <PCNAME>. For the federation!
